awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.

fullplot: In 1930 Marseilles two small-time crooks join forces when they meet brawling over a woman. Starting with fixed horse races and fights, they start to find themselves doing jobs for the local gangster bosses. When they decide to go into the business for themselves, their easy-going approach to crime starts to change.
plot: During the 1930s, in Marseilles, France, two small time crooks work for local crime bosses until they decide to go into business for themselves.
title: Borsalino
